foreignData.name: Zersplitternder Wind
foreignData.text:
{2}{G}: Der Zersplitternde Wind fügt einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
Bringe einen Splitter-Spielstein ins Spiel. Behandle diesen Spielstein wie eine 1/1 fliegende grüne Kreatur mit Kumulativer Versorgung: {G}.
Wenn dieser Spielstein das Spiel verläßt, fügt er Dir und jeder Kreatur, die Du kontrollierst, 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

name: Splintering Wind
originalText:
o2o
G: Splintering Wind deals 1 damage to target creature. Put a Splinter token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 green creature with flying and Cumulative Upkeep: o
G.
If this token leaves play, it deals 1 damage to you and to each creature you control.
text: {2}{G}: Splintering Wind deals 1 damage to target creature. Create a 1/1 green Splinter creature token. It has flying and "Cumulative upkeep {G}." When it leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and each creature you control. (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless they pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
